Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by its creators, reflecting its high-quality materials, innovative design, and unique features. Given its rarity and exclusivity, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. I kindly invite you to consider this extraordinary opportunity. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this masterpiece into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
